prefill_custom_text: fondo limpio, colores neutros, props mínimos, estética premium simple. texturas naturales, sombras coherentes, cero look IA, sin artefactos.

auto_product_desc.title_short: Black Ribbed Crop Top with Broken Heart Design
auto_product_desc.product_description_long: A sleek black ribbed crop top, designed with a classic round neckline and sleeveless cut. The front is adorned with a prominent graphic featuring the white cursive inscription 'No Love Only Style' layered over a vibrant red broken heart symbol. A small, vertically oriented white brand tag, inscribed with 'STYLOS CHIC', is visible on the lower right hem.
key_visual_features: White cursive text 'No Love Only Style'
Red broken heart symbol (broken in two halves)
Small white brand tag on lower right hem
prompt_boosters: Close-up of a black ribbed crop top
Focus on the 'No Love Only Style' text and broken heart graphic
Highlight the texture of the ribbed fabric
Show the small white brand tag on the hem
Product photography on a light grey concrete surface
Emphasize the contrast of red and white on black
